mutants.code:
import re

def convert_punctuation(text):
    contractions = re.findall('', text)
    text = re.sub('[.,:;!()?\\"\\\\\\/\\]\\[\\{\\}\\|]+', '-', text)
    for contraction in contractions:
        text = text.replace(contraction.replace("'", '-'), contraction)
    text = re.sub('\\s-\\s', ' ', text)
    return text

import re

def convert_punctuation(text):
    contractions = re.findall("\\w+'\\w+", text)
    text = re.sub('', '-', text)
    for contraction in contractions:
        text = text.replace(contraction.replace("'", '-'), contraction)
    text = re.sub('\\s-\\s', ' ', text)
    return text

    return text

import re

def convert_punctuation(text):
    contractions = re.findall("\\w+'\\w+", text)
    text = re.sub('[.,:;!()?\\"\\\\\\/\\]\\[\\{\\}\\|]+', '-', text)
    for contraction in contractions:

import re

def convert_punctuation(text):
    contractions = re.findall("\\w+'\\w+", text)
    text = re.sub('[.,:;!()?\\"\\\\\\/\\]\\[\\{\\}\\|]+', '-', text)
    for contraction in contractions:
        text = text.replace(contraction.replace("'", ''), contraction)
    text = re.sub('\\s-\\s', ' ', text)
    return text
